{"name": "Damien Ministries Inc", "alternate_name": "", "description": "A valid picture ID
Proof of your residency
Income statement, no later than two weeks if you are employed and if it is SSI once a calendaryear 
Proof of your HIV status, which would be in the form of lab work showing your CD4 and viral load. This document is needed once a calendar year
Proof of medical insurance
These are all the requirements that we asked you to bring for your initial registration for Food bank services.
Noted that we do have an every six month check  to make sure all customers are in compliance with their documentation.
 Customers are able to come in twice a month on schedule appointments only. 
                                              Emergency food requirements
Proof of your DC residency only residence are eligible for emergency food
Proof of identification
Proof of how many dependents reside in the residence with you
Proof of income
Not yet, if you have other adults that live in your household, you cannot register them. They must register as an individual on their own, and they can also receive food.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2200 Rhode Island Avenue Northeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Northeast Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20018", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9304233, "longitude": -76.9739148}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 526-3020", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Wear Facemask"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Emergency food available. Call to inquire."}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit every  2 weeks"}]}
